biotools.summary: The TCRex web tool provides a user-friendly interface to predict the recognition of pathogenic & cancer epitopes by human T cell receptors (TCRs). It can predict TCR–epitope binding based on TCR beta chain information from full repertoire data files from standard files (Immunoseq, MiXCR, etc), and calculates appropriate statistics.

bioschemas.name: TCRex
